title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From threat to threat intel: 360 degrees of DDOS (NET318)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从威胁到威胁情报：DDoS 攻击的 360 度防护 (NET318)
abstract: Discover how AWS protects web applications at scale by analyzing billions of data points to detect attacks and automatically update defenses. Through real-world case studies, learn how CloudFront, ELB, Shield, and WAF uses threat intelligence to distinguish legitimate traffic from malicious requests while maintaining performance. Hear from Figma on how they leverage AWS’s global threat monitoring network for real-time DDoS protection to ensure business continuity and resilient web delivery. Walk away with actionable insights to safeguard your applications against sophisticated threats.
abstract_cn: 了解AWS如何通过分析数十亿数据点来检测攻击并自动更新防御措施，从而大规模保护Web应用程序。通过真实案例研究，学习CloudFront、ELB、Shield和WAF如何使用威胁情报来区分合法流量和恶意请求，同时保持性能。听取Figma关于如何利用AWS全球威胁监控网络进行实时DDoS防护以确保业务连续性和弹性Web交付的经验分享。带走可操作的见解，保护您的应用程序免受复杂威胁。
